languages.text: {n}Обычная стоическая маска сгинула с лица Хейнрикса без следа — он пораженно взирает на происходящее вокруг.{/n} "Эмелина? Что... что я вижу? Ты творишь ритуалы Архиврага? Но... нет. Остановись. Немедленно. Ни единого жеста, пока я не дозволю!"

{n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Обычная стоическая маска сгинула с лица Хейнрикса без следа — он пораженно взирает на происходящее вокруг.{/n} "Эмелина? Что... что я вижу? Ты творишь ритуалы Архиврага? Но... нет. Остановись. Немедленно. Ни единого жеста, пока я не дозволю!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希一贯冷硬的表情变得无影无踪。他盯着周围的一切，毫不掩饰自己的震惊。{/n}“艾米莉娜？这……这是怎么回事？你是在举行混沌大敌的仪式吗？可——不，住手，立刻停下来。除非我允许，否则一动都不许动！”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一贯冷硬的表情变得无影无踪。他盯着周围的一切，毫不掩饰自己的震惊。{/n}“艾米莉娜？这……这是怎么回事？你是在举行混沌大敌的仪式吗？可——不，住手，立刻停下来。除非我允许，否则一动都不许动！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La máscara estoica habitual de Heinrix se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro y mira a su alrededor con consternación manifiesta.{/n} «¿Emelina? ¿Qué...? ¿Qué es esto? ¿Está realizando los rituales del Archienemigo? Pero... No. Deténgase. De inmediato. ¡No mueva ni un dedo a menos que se lo ordene!».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La máscara estoica habitual de Heinrix se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro y mira a su alrededor con consternación manifiesta.{/n} «¿Emelina? ¿Qué...? ¿Qué es esto? ¿Está realizando los rituales del Archienemigo? Pero... No. Deténgase. De inmediato. ¡No mueva ni un dedo a menos que se lo ordene!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスのいつもの禁欲主義の仮面は跡形もなく溶けて消え去った…彼は明らかに狼狽した様子で周囲を見つめている。{/n}「エメリナさん？これは…これは何です？渾沌の勢力の儀式を行っているのか？だけも…いけない、やめてください。今すぐに。我が言わない限り動いてはなりません！」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスのいつもの禁欲主義の仮面は跡形もなく溶けて消え去った…彼は明らかに狼狽した様子で周囲を見つめている。{/n}「エメリナさん？これは…これは何です？渾沌の勢力の儀式を行っているのか？だけも…いけない、やめてください。今すぐに。我が言わない限り動いてはなりません！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le masque stoïque d'Heinrix a disparu sans laisser de trace. Il regarde autour de lui sans chercher à cacher sa consternation.{/n} « Emelina ? Que... Que faites-vous ? Vous vous adonnez aux rituels du Grand Ennemi ? Mais... Non. Arrêtez sur-le-champ. Plus un geste jusqu'à nouvel ordre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le masque stoïque d'Heinrix a disparu sans laisser de trace. Il regarde autour de lui sans chercher à cacher sa consternation.{/n} « Emelina ? Que... Que faites-vous ? Vous vous adonnez aux rituels du Grand Ennemi ? Mais... Non. Arrêtez sur-le-champ. Plus un geste jusqu'à nouvel ordre ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' übliche stoische Maske ist spurlos verschwunden – er blickt sich unverhohlen bestürzt um.{/n} "Emelina? "Was ... was soll das? Ihr führt Rituale des Erzfeinds aus? Aber ... Nein. Hört auf! Sofort! Keine Bewegung mehr, bis ich es sage!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' übliche stoische Maske ist spurlos verschwunden – er blickt sich unverhohlen bestürzt um.{/n} "Emelina? "Was ... was soll das? Ihr führt Rituale des Erzfeinds aus? Aber ... Nein. Hört auf! Sofort! Keine Bewegung mehr, bis ich es sage!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in her daim taktığı stoik maskesi, hepten düşüyor. Etrafına katıksız bir dehşetle bakınıyor.{/n} "Emelina? Bu... Bu nedir? Şerbaşı'nın ayinlerini mi gerçekleştiriyorsun? Ama... Hayır. Dur. Derhâl. Ben demeden tek bir hareket bile yapma!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's usual mask of stoicism has melted away without a trace — he stares around him in undisguised dismay.{/n} "Emelina? What... what is this? You're performing the Archenemy's rituals? But— no. Stop. Right now. Not another move unless I tell you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in her daim taktığı stoik maske tamamen eriyip gidiyor. Etrafına katıksız bir dehşetle bakınıyor.{/n} "Emelina? Bu... Bu nedir? Şerbaşı'nın ayinlerini mi gerçekleştiriyorsun? Ama... Hayır. Dur. Derhâl. Ben sana söylemeden tek bir hareket bile yapma!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
